title: Can’t Stop, Won’t Stop
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Like I said, Ai-san, Umi-san was worried about it too, so please don’t go overboard on your pranks with Honoka-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Making Umi worry surely isn’t good…. Ai will reflect on it. From now on, Ai will only do pranks that Ai have consulted everyone with!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Pranks that you’ve consulted everyone with….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah! Surprising you guys would be bad after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Is that…. a good thing, or a bad thing…. I’m starting to get confused….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright then, let’s get started<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh!? Already!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah. So the other day, when Ai was playing with Honoka~, *whisper whisper*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh…. Eeeh!? Wow, that seems really…. fun….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Isn’t it? It’s fine, right~? Ai will tell Umi beforehand, Ai will go text Honoka too. You’re in, right, Shizuku!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>….Yeah! Definitely!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
